description: Construction of first and second floor extension to front of industrial unit with undercroft car parking to provide ancillary office space, and alterations to front fatade of existing building.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with Drawing Numbers 001, 002, 005 Rev A, 006 Rev A, and 007.  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be in accordance with drawing number 006 Rev A.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7:4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policy 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan 20111 and Policy 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing core Strategy 2012.. | The proposed first and second storey shall only be used for offices ancillary to the existing use (B2 use), as shown on the approved drawings, and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class B" of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended 2010), or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), without planning permission first being obtained via the submission of a planning application to the Local Planning Authority.  REASON:  To restrict the use of the premises to B2 use and an ancillary office use, in accordance with policy 4A of the adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policy 1.1 of the Ealing Local Development Framework Core Strategy (2012) and policies 4.1 and 4.4 of the London Plan (2011).
